projectRole.name: Administrators
projectRole.description: A project role that represents administrators in a project

issueType.name: Bug
issueType.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

issueType.name: Epic
issueType.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.

issueType.name: Story
issueType.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.

issueType.name: Task
issueType.description: A task that needs to be done.

individualFieldConfig.helpText: Epic Colour field for Jira Software use only.
Provide a short name to identify this epic.
Choose an epic to assign this issue to.
Epic Status field for Jira Software use only.
For example operating system, software platform and/or hardware specifications (include as appropriate for the issue).

An estimate of how much work remains until this issue will be resolved.
The format of this is ' *w *d *h *m ' (representing weeks, days, hours and minutes - where * can be any number)
Examples: 4d, 5h 30m, 60m and 3w.
Allows work to be logged whilst creating, editing or transitioning issues.
Epic Colour field for Jira Software use only.
Provide a short name to identify this epic.
Choose an epic to assign this issue to.
Epic Status field for Jira Software use only.
For example operating system, software platform and/or hardware specifications (include as appropriate for the issue).

An estimate of how much work remains until this issue will be resolved.
The format of this is ' *w *d *h *m ' (representing weeks, days, hours and minutes - where * can be any number)
Examples: 4d, 5h 30m, 60m and 3w.
Allows work to be logged whilst creating, editing or transitioning issues.

screen.name: Default Screen
screen.description: Allows to update all system fields.

priority.name: High
priority.description: Serious problem that could block progress.

priority.name: Medium
priority.description: Has the potential to affect progress.

priority.name: Low
priority.description: Minor problem or easily worked around.

resolution.name: Done
resolution.description: Work has been completed on this issue.

resolution.name: Duplicate
resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce
resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

status.name: In Progress
status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.

status.name: In Review
status.description: This status is managed internally by Jira Software

status.name: Open
status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

workflowScheme.name: VSMET WFS
workflowScheme.description: Generated by JIRA Software version 7.12.0-DAILY20180906101548. This workflow scheme is managed internally by Jira Software. Do not manually modify this workflow scheme.

filter.author: vsmet
filter.name: Filter for VSMET1 board
filter.query: project = VSMET1 ORDER BY Rank ASC

filter.author: vsmet
filter.name: Not Updated < Start of the Day

filter.author: vsmet
filter.name: VSMET Scrum Board
filter.query: project = VSMET ORDER BY Rank ASC

parameter.value: filter-vsmet@@Not Updated < Start of the Day
